text: David Frank Crisafulli (; born 14 April 1979) is an Australian politician who is currently serving as the 41st Premier of Queensland. He has served as the leader of the Liberal National Party (LNP) since 2020. He was the member for Mundingburra from 2012 until 2015, before being elected to the seat of Broadwater in 2017. He became Premier by winning the 2024 state election as Opposition Leader. Category:Premiers of Queensland Category:Members of the Legislative Assembly of Queensland Category:1979 births Category:Living people
title: David Crisafulli
